Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='LMWR02')

BibliographicData.Title: Origins of callosal projections to the supplementary motor area (SMA): a direct comparison between pre-SMA and SMA-proper in macaque monkeys.

Reference.Quotation: "In three animals (Monkeys 1, 2, and 3), Fast Blue (FB) was injected in the pre-SMA, and Diamidino Yellow (DY) was injected in the SMA-proper of the same hemisphere. To assess possible differences due to the intrinsic properties of the two tracers, they were interchanged in another animal."
"the majority of labeled neurons were found in the counterpart of the injected area in the opposite hemisphere."
"the majority of labeled neurons were found in the counterpart of the injected area in the opposite hemisphere."
